name: Performer's Companion Vol. III
entries: This tome contains the secrets to performance and writing.
It can be read over 1 week to grant a creature a {@dice 1d10} to one roll during their downtime.
Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Artist, Journalism, Performance, or Cook Wage Progression by 3
Once this book has been used in this way 4 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
